source_text: a 1% Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) for all mineral production from the Joint Venture tenements;
additional_details: Investigator Resources Limited will receive this royalty. It is payable by Pernatty Co Pty Ltd (a subsidiary of Discover Co Pty Ltd). Pernatty has a once-off option to acquire the NSRs at an agreed or independently determined price if they announce a decision to mine. If Investigator wishes to sell the NSRs to a third party, Pernatty has the right to acquire them at the price offered by that third party buyer within 30 days of the offer.
